casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, Trustee
v.
Claude M. BROUILLARD et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 14, 2018 Claude M. Brouillard, self-represented, and Mei-wa Cheng, self-represented, in support of the petition. David M. Bizar, in opposition.

The petition by the defendants Claude M. Brouillard and Mei-wa Cheng for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 41495) is denied.
